segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so high that he’s almost falling off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’ve done this before; they seem too comfortable with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dishes that she doesn’t even see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring everywhere, and she’s just standing there, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice the mess or if she’s just going to keep ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip over, and I’m just waiting for the inevitable fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get hurt, and the woman won’t even know why.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
